abstract: New York Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul, whose right index ringer was amputated after July 4th fireworks accident, does not report for first day of training camp; team officials say they have no information on his condition and further report he has not yet signed franchise offer.
lead_paragraph: Pierre-Paul, who lost his right index finger in a fireworks accident, did not report for the first day of training camp Thursday, and the team has no information on his condition.

headline.main: Giants Say They Have Not Seen Jason Pierre-Paul Since Accident
headline.print_headline: Giants Still Don’t Know Pierre-Paul’s Condition

snippet: Pierre-Paul, who lost his right index finger in a fireworks accident, did not report for the first day of training camp Thursday, and the team has no information on his condition.
